prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with slimy, purple skin and large, green eyes.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a slug, featuring soft curves and delicate antennae.
Generate a creature with pastel colors and a unique, serpentine body shape.
Make a cute, friendly Pokemon that thrives in forest and cave environments.
Imagine a small, purple creature with a shiny, smooth exterior and gentle demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that showcases a blend of dragon and slime characteristics.
Show me a Pokemon with large expressive eyes and a tranquil personality.
